reviews.review: Not being able to play co-op is ridiculous. Load times are way too long. There's still a lot of potential in the game.

Dead by Daylight, il concept del gioco è semplice: 5 giocatori divisi in 4 sopravissuti e 1 killer. Lo scopo? Per i sopravissuti trovare e riparare 5 generatori e scappare da 2 porte. 
Per i killer è l'opposto:impedire che tutto quello che ho detto prima accada e con questo abbiamo un'esercito di killer ognuno con abilità uniche
Questo è il gioco in se,all'interno ci sono abilità alcune uniche per personaggi e oggetti da utilizzare per soppravivere (torce che accecano i killer,med kit per curarti e casse per riparare più veloce o per sabotare ganci o trappole)
Come in tutte le mie recensioni sotto elencherò i pro e i contro del gioco più qualche considerazione finale

Pro:
Tante varietà di personaggi ma...
Divertimento!
varie mappe ma...
Ansia(non troppa)
graficamente ok

Contro:
...sono la maggior parte a pagamento ed alcuni al momento sono leggermente sbilanciati
Alle lunghe è lo stesso gioco
tante mappe con pochissima interazione
Community molto negativa.

Il gioco in se è veramente bello,sì alle lunghe può stancare ma giocato con amici diventa la cosa più ignorante della giornata. I dlc a pagamento sono tantini e anche se sono tutti worth non aiutano in modo positivo il giocatore.
Community mini cancer molti si lamentano di tutto-i

Nel finale bello il gioco per il prezzo e ciò che offre :) 7/10
Buy the game
Geiles Game

黎明改档,黎明拔线,黎明加速,黎明XXX...虽然这个游戏一开始有诸多BUG和不完善的地方,但不可否认的是这游戏确实有恐怖的气氛,只是因为一开始人类太过强势导致忘了这是一个恐怖游戏,人类用无敌房溜屠夫而屠夫却只能望天感叹:南村群童欺我老无力!/(ㄒoㄒ)/~~我相信官方接下来会平衡并且完善相关机制,让人类真正感受到什么叫”死在白天”!(百度翻译2333)

Ein sehr spannendes Spiel am meisten macht es Spaß wenn man sich mit Freunden trift und gemeinsam spielt ;) Witzig auch wenn der Killer hört was die überlebenden vorhaben. Schade das man die Punkte die man in einer Freunde Lobby nicht nutzen kann um im Freundschaftsspiel auch auf zu leveln. Erwarte nicht die Punkte mit rüber zu nehmen es sollte eben für beides die Möglichkeit geben seperat zu Leveln...wenn man versteht was ich meine :D Aber sonst ich war Killer und Überlebende beides macht Spaß ich hoffe es kommen noch ein paar Personen hinzu.

Excellent concept, spot-on gameplay that's easy to learn, nice graphics, and fun maps... all ruined by horrible matchmaking (you can't play with one or two friends - you need five whole people, or you're forced to play with an entire team of randoms), and a complete lack of in-game communication (a co-op game without in-game commuinication... great idea!).  If they fix the matchmaking and add in-game communication between survivors, I will change my review.

Edit to add: weeks later and my negative recommendation still stands.  The matchmaking is horrible (it takes several minutes just to find a game), it does not match you with people like your rank (nothing quite like being a low-level survivor matched with a top-ranked killer, and vice-versa), you cannot play with your friends (the game simply does not allow it to work), there are several game-breaking issues (such as ring-around-the-rosies created by chokepoints), and the latency on servers is caused by the poor P2P choice.  To cherry on top is that anyone who voices these legitimate complaints to the community are met with verbal abuse about how they should just "git gud."

Final edit: they fixed the matchmatching, ended the problem of people leaving all the time by hiding levels and ranks from other players, and solved a lot of the match dropping.  Not to mention that you are able to play with friends now - it finally works.  I'm a happy camper now.

So I wanted to play with friends. In total i played 100 minutes, a total of 90 minutes waiting and 10 minutes playing. Steam is saying COOP when i can not even go coop.

I get failed to join a game very often which is annoying. But what bothers me the most is that the game is saying you can play COOP but that isnt even possible.

Another point is that I sometimes finaly join a game but it send you back to the homepage, so you can find another game. 

I rate this game 3/10, implementing playing with friends, I recommend this game

PS. If you can make it so you can play with friends the game is much better.

我超喜欢这一款游戏，简单的规则，但氛围和画面真的做得很棒~其中“猫捉老鼠”真的能让玩家有紧迫感！强烈推荐这款游戏。不过，目前还有一些bug影响游戏体验。比方说输入法和跳跃有时候的不兼容。更严重的是，就在刚刚，屠夫杀死了我以后，居然无法将我抓起来，队友也无法救治我。不知道这些是不是几率性的bug，我希望能够得到修复。总体来说，就算有这些bug，我还是非常的喜欢这一款游戏！！！

这游戏让我回忆起了高中时候，在教室后排上课睡觉的心理活动！！！！

紧张刺激是游戏的中心思想，以及解救队友后的成功逃跑的自豪感！

Trapper 捕兽人 (就是会放捕兽夹的那个)，相关地图：麦克米兰庄园

背景故事： 他叫 Evan Macmillan (伊万·麦克米兰)，家里超有钱，超听老爹的话。老爹说让干啥他就干啥，所以某天他发疯的老爹让他带着一百多人进了矿洞并且引爆了炸药，他照做了... 而后就没人再见过他...

Wraith 怒灵 (就是会敲钟隐身的那个)，相关地图：汽车天堂废车场

背景故事： 他叫 Philip Ojomo (飞利浦·欧摩)，外国移民，有老婆有孩子，在废车场工作。直到有一天他发现他刚压扁的车里好像还装着人，在询问监工后他得知这个废车场经常帮黑社会什么的压人，随后他一想自己也压了有百十辆车了，所以他就怒了，把监工给压了，随后抽走了监工尸体的颅骨和脊椎 (游戏里怨灵使用的斧子貌似是用这个做的)，然后他就去向不明了...

Hillbilly 乡巴佬 (电锯男)，相关地图：冷风农场

背景故事： 姓汤普森 (Thompson) 名不详。冷风农场主的孩子，但因生的丑陋所以一直被爸妈关着，从小不见天日。你也知道，人被关在一个四面都是墙的地方时间长了心理就会出问题，所以他逃出去之后便杀了将他禁闭多年的双亲，然后他觉得农场的动物都比他自由，所以他就杀了农场上的动物，后来他看见会动的生物就不爽...反正就不停的杀杀杀，而后他就销声匿迹了...

This game is simply amazing so far. The sense of comraderie you get from traveling with others, then being rescued by them while you're hanging on the hook is simply amazing, especially because you cant even talk to each other.

My only complaint is that there isnt a party system.

The game is fun, but if you're hoping to play with friends, look for a different game until this one has a party system, or you have 4 friends who have the game. It is so painful trying to join a lobby with a friend. Also, unless your willing to wait 5-10 minutes, playing the killer is out of the question. Devs should've made it randomized, just sayin.

This is probably one of the more stressful games I've played in a long time, but it's a good kind of stressful. You hop into a match as a survivor and you are instantly getting a look at you're surroundings, you're looking for crates and generators but most importantly, you're  looking for the killer. He could be around any corner you turn or stalking you from the shadows, you have no idea. You always have a little voice at the back or you're head telling you to look behind you, hid behind that bush or run away. Playing with others can be difficult, and some killers camp your soon to be dead body when they hang you on the hook, but it just adds to the tension that the game pushes for. Overall, I'd recommend this game, it has really caught my attention and I've played it almost non stop since I got it. The only thing I wish was available was playing a match with friends, not in the private lobby but on a public match. Hopefully the devs add that eventually .

Game is amazing, very addicting and so fun. Just wish we can gain tokens for We Are Gonna Live Forever, for example instead of having to hook everyone and making sure they get away safely which is hard because everyone is either saving for the points or the hooked person doesn't get away safely. I just wish it was as good as Barbecue and Chili for hunter. A good a way I think we should get extra tokens is if you fully heal another player. Other than that, I still love the game.
为什么没汉化啊...

Un jeu plus que médiocre aucun contenu,le prestige 1 n'apporte absolument rien appart un skin du personnage en sang et le droit de recommencer niveau 1  sans compétences wouaaah +de 50h de jeu pour ca !  Toutes les DLC seront payantes aucune nouveauté gratuite ou alors inutile si gratuité.Trop répétitif les survivants tournent en rond ou reste aux fenêtres pour pas se faire attraper tellement ils sont mauvais joueurs et quand ils se font attraper quand même ils quittent la partie pour pas perdre leur rang c'est pitoyable.Quand aux boosters tueurs -surivants n'en parlons meme pas ! Au lieu de régler ce problème ils ont investit dans un anti cheat qui ban à tout va n'importe qui sans preuves juste sur des bons scores ou des signalement de mauvais joueurs et quand on demande une réponse sur le support ils vous bannissent instant incapable de vous dire pourquoi ,aucune communication avec les joueurs seul l'argent empocher compte ! Faites attention si vous investissez dans ce jeu vous pourriez être banni comme bon nombre de joueurs!

Love the game so far! Playing with my friends in private match makes the best for memories.

The game could be better optimized but it doesn't really matter. I know once they add a que for online matchmaiking this game will start being really popular. They are adding it next patch so I recommend you buy it.

Trust me once in a game it will be fun.

- monster sees you way too easily
- grass needs to be longer and more abundant
- monster runs way too fast
- its basically impossible to escape him one he hits you because he can see your blood trail
- generators need to stop spawning inside houses where there is no where to hide that isnt obvious when hes near
- closets are just useless to hide in unless he isnt near

basically the game is way too unbalanced at the moment and losing is too frequent when youre a survivor because you cannot talk in game. unless you have a party you will most likely become too frusrated with this game.
挺不错的游戏，只是游戏不是很平衡，希望下个版本能改，现在拔线对人影响大，不过对屠夫没影响了，而且改档狗，开挂狗也没了。
